item.title: GM Intends To Reshore Buick Envision Production To US, May End Bolt EV Production In Time: Report
item.description: The Buick Envision is currently built in China and the Chevrolet Bolt EV is produced at the Fairfax Assembly plant in Kansas City.

item.title: Why Is Trump Suing JPMorgan Chase And Its CEO For $5 Billion?
item.description: President Donald Trump is suing JPMorgan Chase & Co. (JPM) and its CEO Jamie Dimon for closing his and related parties’ bank accounts in 2021.

item.title: Apple Scales Hardware Chief John Ternus’ Role To Design Amid CEO Candidacy Rumors: Report
item.description: According to a report from Bloomberg, CEO Tim Cook pulled in Ternus to manage Apple’s design teams at the end of last year.
